Verses: 1 naan sonnadhu: yaakkObin thalaivargaLE, iSravEl vamsaththu adhipadhigaLE, nyaayam innadhendru aRivadhu ungaLukku allavO aduththadhu.
2 aanaalum nanmaiyai veRuththu, theemaiyai virumbi avargaLmElirukkiRa avargaLudaiya thOlaiyum avargaL elumbugaLmEl irukkiRa avargaLudaiya sadhaiyaiyum pidungi,

3 en janaththin sadhaiyaiththindru, avargaLmEl irukkiRa avargaLudaiya thOlai urindhukoNdu, avargaL elumbugaLai muRiththu, paanaiyilE pOdumvaNNamaagavum iRaichchiyaik kopparaikkuLLE pOdumvaNNamaagavum avaigaLaith thuNdikkiRaargaL.

4 appozhudhu avargaL karththarai nOkkik kooppiduvaargaL; aanaalum avargaL thangaL kiriyaigaLil pollaadhavargaLaanapadiyinaal, avar avargaLukku maRuuththaravu kodaamal, thamadhu mugaththai akkaalaththilE avargaLukku maRaiththukkoLLuvaar.

5 thangaL paRkaLinaal kadikkiRavargaLaayirundhu, samaadhaanamendrusolli, thangaL vaaikku uNavaikkodaadhavanukku virOdhamaaga saNdaikku aayaththampaNNi, en janaththai mOsampOkkugiRa theerkkadharisigaLukku virOdhamaaik karththar sollugiRadhu ennavendraalï¿½;
6 dharisanankaaNak koodaadha raaththiriyum, kuRisollak koodaadha andhagaaramum ungaLukku varum; theerkkadharisigaLinmEl sooriyan aSthamiththu, avargaLmEl pagal kaariruLaaip pOgum.
7 dharisanam paarkkiRavargaL vetki, kuRisollugiRavargaL naaNi, uththaravukodukkiRa dhEvan illaadhadhinaal avargaL ellaarum thangaL vaayai mooduvaargaL.
8 naanO, yaakkObukku avan meeRudhalaiyum iSravElukku avan paavaththaiyum aRivikkumpadi, karththarudaiya aavi aruLiya balaththinaalum, nyaayaththinaalum, paraakkiramaththinaalum nirappappattirukkiREn.
10 seeyOnai raththappazhiyinaalum, erusalEmai aniyaayaththinaalum kattuvikkiRa yaakkObu vamsaththuth thalaivargaLE, iSravEl vamsaththu adhipadhigaLE, idhaik kELungaL.

11 adhin thalaivargaL paridhaanaththukku nyaayantheerkkiRaargaL; adhin aasaariyargaL koolikku ubadhEsikkiRaargaL; adhin theerkkadharisigaL paNaththukkuk kuRisollugiRaargaL; aagilum avargaL karththarai saarndhukoNdu: karththar engaL naduvil illaiyO? theengu engaLmEl varaadhu engiRaargaL.
12 aagaiyaal ungaLnimiththam seeyOn vayalveLiyaippOla uzhappattu, erusalEm maNmEdugaLaaippOm, aalayaththin parvadham kaattumEdugaLaaippOm.
